channel.title: Mail on timerring
channel.description: Recent content in Mail on timerring

item.title: Mail Service and Protocol
item.description: Recently, I have been working on DNS of my domain name. And then I need to set up the mail service of my domain name. When I tried many times, I always failed to receive the mail on my phone. Suddenly, I remembered that I didn’t set up IMAP service. So let’s review the mail service and protocol.
